page.title: 19ECOLOGY.
page.content: There are many flowers which grow wild one of them is the bright pink thrift which grows in small cracks in the rocks just above the tide level. One other which grows wild is the sea campion which spreads in a group. The yellow gorse is pretty to look at as it is bright yellow ,if the weather gets too hot for the gorse it will start to burn and catch fire. After a few hours it will die down and next morning all around will be black. During a dry spell in the summer you will often see fires on the moors around Penzance.
